news_header: Lobo Tiggre discusses his stock picks for 2025, focusing on gold, silver, uranium, and copper, while emphasizing the importance of selective investing.
news_original_title: Lobo Tiggre: Gold, Silver, Uranium, Copper — Bullish, but Pick Stocks Wisely
news_text: Lobo Tiggre, CEO of IndependentSpeculator.com, outlines his stock preferences for 2025, highlighting sectors like gold, silver, uranium, and copper. He warns that not all stocks will benefit from market trends, advising investors to be selective rather than buying ETFs or entire sectors. Tiggre also shares his views on market volatility related to the Trump trade. For more insights, viewers can check the interview and related resources.
